RebinVolumeCapacity.Title: Volume Capacity
RebinVolumeCapacity.Exc: Enter the maximum volume capacity in cm³ for the rebin cart in use.

RebinVolumeThreshold.Title: Volume Threshold Percentage

RebinSalesOrderCapacity.Exc: Enter the order limit of the rebin cart in use.

DurationBetweenAddresses.Title: Travel Time Between Locations
DurationBetweenAddresses.Exc: Enter the travel time in seconds between two sequential locations of the picker.

DurationBetweenAisles.Title: Travel Time Between Aisles
DurationBetweenAisles.Exc: Enter the travel time in seconds between two sequential aisle of the picker.

ProductPickingDuration.Title: Item Pick Time
ProductPickingDuration.Exc: Enter the time spent in seconds by the picker when scanned an item.

SpecialProductPickingDuration.Title: Special Item Pick Time
SpecialProductPickingDuration.Exc: Enter the time spent in seconds by the picker when scanned an item with a specialty like expiration date, serial number etc.

PickListPickingDuration.Title: Maximum Pick Time
PickListPickingDuration.Exc: Enter the maximum time in seconds needed to pick the items of the created pick list.

PickListPickingDurationThreshold.Title: Pick Time Threshold Percentage
PickListPickingDurationThreshold.Exc: Enter the percentage of threshold of the time needed to pick the items of the created pick list.

ToteVolumeCapacity.Title: Tote Volume Capacity
ToteVolumeCapacity.Exc: Enter the maximum volume in cm³ for the tote in use.

ToteVolumeThreshold.Title: Tote Volume Threshold Percentage
ToteVolumeThreshold.Exc: Enter the percentage of threshold of the capacity of the tote in use.

ToteWeightCapacity.Title: Tote Weight Capacity
ToteWeightCapacity.Exc: Enter the maximum weight in grams for the tote in use.

BatchTrolleyToteCountLimit.Title: Batch Cart Tote Limit
